query:
-- First, check if user exists and get their ID
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE email = 'admin@eterbox.com';

-- Create super admin permissions for the user
-- Replace USER_ID with the actual ID from the query above
INSERT INTO admin_permissions (
  user_id, 
  is_super_admin, 
  can_view_users, 
  can_edit_users, 
  can_delete_users,
  can_send_bulk_emails, 
  can_view_revenue, 
  can_manage_admins, 
  can_view_analytics
)
SELECT 
  id,
  true,
  true,
  true,
  true,
  true,
  true,
  true,
  true
FROM users 
WHERE email = 'admin@eterbox.com'
ON CONFLICT (user_id) 
DO UPDATE SET
  is_super_admin = true,
  can_view_users = true,
  can_edit_users = true,
  can_delete_users = true,
  can_send_bulk_emails = true,
  can_view_revenue = true,
  can_manage_admins = true,
  can_view_analytics = true,
  updated_at = NOW();
